title: Italy Hopeful That Coronavirus Pandemic Is Slowing Down - The Wall Street Journal
description: Italy Hopeful That Coronavirus Pandemic Is Slowing Down The Wall Street Journal No let-up in coronavirus deaths in Italy, new cases steady Reuters Italy health official says nation hit 'plateau' 3 weeks after lockdown New York Post Italy’s New Virus Cases Dec…
content: ROMEItalian authorities believe the countrys coronavirus epidemic, the worlds deadliest, is slowing down appreciably after three weeks of national lockdown, a hopeful sign for other Western countries that are following approaches similar to Italys with a time… [+185 chars]
